title: Great Interview with Akira Kobayashi
content:
Newly written and published in Tokyo’s PingMag: an interview with Akira Kobayashi, designer of FF Clifford and author of the best book on Western typography that you’ve never read.

[http://www.pingmag.jp/2006/03/24/akira-kobayashi-transcending-typographic-boundaries/](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329180941/http:/www.pingmag.jp/2006/03/24/akira-kobayashi-transcending-typographic-boundaries/)
author: ilynam
